definition: to compensate for loss/to indemnify/to suffer a financial loss
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)

sentences.english: The lawyers dissected his claim for damages.
sentences.chinese: 律师们仔细分析了他提出的赔偿要求。

sentences.english: For registered mail, compensation shall be made according to standard amounts formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 挂号信件，按照国务院邮政主管部门规定的金额赔偿。

sentences.english: Muller Martini is seeking damages and injunctive relief.
sentences.chinese: 穆勒马提尼是要求赔偿和禁令救济。

sentences.english: The respondent shall not be liable for compensating the injuries for RST.
sentences.chinese: 答辩人对RST伤害赔偿不应承担责任。

sentences.english: Author major make substantive research damages from the point of view of the scope of compensation.
sentences.chinese: 笔者主要从损害赔偿范围的角度进行实务性研究。

sentences.english: After be like formalities all ready, insurance company should be compensated for in end a case inside 10 days.
sentences.chinese: 若手续齐备后，保险公司应在10天内一次结案赔偿。

sentences.english: Put a bad price as compensation.
He was given a conditional discharge and ordered to pay compensation.
sentences.chinese: 他被有条件地释放了，被责令支付赔偿款。

sentences.english: The 2nd day asks to decline goods and cost of compensatory medical treatment and mental loss to bazaar.
sentences.chinese: 第二日到商场要求退货和赔偿医疗费和精神损失。

sentences.english: The court ordered the Japanese side to pay compensation in this case.
sentences.chinese: 在这个案件中，法庭判令日方赔偿。

sentences.english: Regarding compensation for a man crushed to death by a falling fork-lift truck.
sentences.chinese: 关于一个工人被趺下来的铲车致死的赔偿。

sentences.english: We will reimburse the customer for any or damage.
sentences.chinese: 我们将赔偿顾客所受稻的壹茄笋失何损害。

sentences.english: After leaving hospital, li Mou compensates for matters concerned with inn square bargaining.
sentences.chinese: 出院后，李某就和店方交涉赔偿事宜。

sentences.english: The relief the plaintiff sought was an injunction and damages.
sentences.chinese: 原告请求的救济为强制令和损害赔偿金。

sentences.english: Mr Wang was awarded compensation of 240,000 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 王先生获得了24万元的经济赔偿。

sentences.english: Peng was ordered to pay 4, 000 yuan in compensation to the woman.
sentences.chinese: Peng被要求支付4000元给那名妇人作为赔偿。

definition: to ask for compensation/to claim damages/claim for damages
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
to settle privately/to solve behind closed doors/to settle out of court
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
